author: ohraemez
content:
my lh-geth ran fine for a few hours on merge-devnet-5. but now I am seeing the following error:
`Mar 05 00:19:02.443 ERRO Failed to update eth1 cache             error: Failed to update eth1 block cache: "FailedToInsertEth1Block(InconsistentTimestamp { parent: 1646386176, child: 1646385811 })", retry_millis: 60000, service: eth1_rpc`

author: jgm
content: Is there a list anywhere of the particular branches and command line options that each client needs to run to join devnet 5?

author: parithosh
content:
The branches can be found here: https://notes.ethereum.org/D5xK4XrmTb6MKGudf_hcrg?view

I don't think we have an easy list for the commands yet. But you should be able to get it from the configs here: https://github.com/parithosh/consensus-deployment-ansible/blob/master/merge-devnet-5/inventory/group_vars/eth2client_lighthouse.yml

author: parithosh
content: Is your el active and healthy?

author: ohraemez
content: the problem went away for now without me intervening. but geth looked healthy throughout
